name: Bug Tracker
description: A project management app that's intended for use as an internal tool within an organization. Users can create projects, assign members, and submit tickets to efficiently track and resolve bugs. Admins have additional privileges to manage other users within the app.

name: Ovenglow
description: An intuitive website designed for a baker to showcase and sell their products while keeping track of orders and managing them. This site features ecommerce, image upload using cloudinary, localization using the Mapbox API, and much more.
